docs.lead_paragraph:
As an accomplished mountaineer who has scaled many of the world’s highest peaks, including Mount Everest, Annabelle Bond has found herself in some dicey situations.
 
Now she finds herself in a very different sort of predicament — a nasty legal fight between a former lover and her current one.

headline.main: Millionaires Clash Over Socialite’s Child Support Claims

docs.snippet: The hedge fund manager Warren G. Lichtenstein is fighting with Andrew Cader, a former Goldman Sachs executive, over a British socialite’s child support claims. | George Soros disclosed a 7.9 percent stake in J.C. Penney, a retailer without many ...
docs.abstract: The hedge fund manager Warren G. Lichtenstein is fighting with Andrew Cader, a former Goldman Sachs executive, over a British socialite’s child support claims. | George Soros disclosed a 7.9 percent stake in J.C. Penney, a retailer without many fans on Wall Street. | Two senators introducing a new banking bill can be thought of as punk rockers. | Though they’re now allowed to tweet, companies are being cautious.

headline.main: Millionaires in a Legal Skirmish Over Child Support
